targets.rawSql: SELECT $__time("ts"), NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision as anomaly_score FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1;
SELECT $__time("ts"), sum(CASE WHEN lower("pred_attack") IN ('true','t','1','yes') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as attacks FROM predictions_staging WHERE "ts" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT count(*) FROM predictions_staging WHERE lower("pred_attack") IN ('true','t','1','yes') AND "ts" >= now() - interval '1 hour';
SELECT avg(NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision) FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL AND "ts" >= now() - interval '1 hour';
